channel.title: Editing old posts
channel.description:
Don't know when or why this was ever added, but it seems that you no longer can edit posts that are even just a few months old. can this please be changed back?
edit: I didn't make that petition that RSCShadow posted

item.title: Editing old posts
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Moparscape is the parent forum after all…

Read full topic

item.title: Editing old posts
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Terraforming, post:26, topic:544137”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=663018.msg4433428#msg4433428 date=1404236222]

Didn’t we kick you off the forum? ^.^

No I left, because Moparscape was empty.

Yet you ask for your account back?
[/quote]

:palm: I left Moparscape like 9 months ago or more. I came back because I got banned on Rune-Server, and decided to re-join Moparscape, since it’s the second to only good forums I like.[/quote]

If you’re banned there why should we allow you on here?

Read full topic

item.title: Editing old posts
item.dc:creator: @Terraforming Terraforming
item.description:
@Terraforming wrote:

Moparisthebest:

If you need to edit an old post, just PM a staff member and we can allow you to do it for a valid reason. This was done because some people were removing all of their old posts or similar.

This is way off topic, but I couldn’t find a suitable place for this.

I have an old account named ‘Driman Rune’ and I tried entering 50 different password for it, but none of them work.
I don’t ever recall changing the password, or what email I set it on. I tried entering the secret question, which I totally forgot the answer to it, I don’t know if I was to lazy to make a real one.

I have vouches that that’s my account. You can contact Docent, and Arham, since them two always know my new accounts. If not can you give me the email I set the account on? Please?

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Editing old posts
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If you need to edit an old post, just PM a staff member and we can allow you to do it for a valid reason. This was done because some people were removing all of their old posts or similar.

Read full topic

This.

item.title: Editing old posts
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Sessy Pk3r:

Looking at R-S, a lot of the help threads get removed once people find the solution even though it may benefit someone else. This usually results in a ton of redundant threads. :\

Who takes 2 weeks to find a solution?

Read full topic

item.title: Editing old posts
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I met a guy online, he thinks I’m retarded because I’m a retard at coding and make pointless comments. Regret ever posting it, can’t even edit or delete the post

Eventually he started spreading it to the point my parents called me a failure and grounded me so I could l2code.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing old posts
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I throw out retarded posts all the time without a single eye twitch because I don’t care what you tribesmen think about them or me. If you care what people over the Internet think about you then I hate to see how hard life hits you.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing old posts
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Whackatre:

yep. and mopar said he even wanted our posts to be on version control or something. well, something like that, anyway.

What does he want an archive of every post now? I’m sure you could save each post to a db with some columns to show edited text , deleted/time etc.

enzo42:

Mopar is dying because of stupid shit like this (talking about the fact you can’t edit posts)

See when you grow up a little and come back to this post in a couple months, you’ll realize how retarded that post was (even though it’s half true, it’s just an example) but unfortunately you won’t be able to remove it, so people will always think you’re retarded and use that post against you

Read full topic

item.title: Editing old posts
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:11, topic:544137”]Mopar is dying because of stupid shit like this (talking about the fact you can’t edit posts)[/quote] I can feel my brain cells dying and my blood pressure rising.

OT: It goes both ways. Looking at R-S, a lot of the help threads get removed once people find the solution even though it may benefit someone else. This usually results in a ton of redundant threads. :\

Read full topic
